mapper.select: select SR_ID, SR_TITLE, REQ_DT, DUE_DT, SR_CONT, REL_SYS, SR_STAT, DELT_YN, FIRST_INPT_DT, FIRST_INPT_ID, REV_CMT, MEM_NO, MEM_NM, INST_ID, INST_NM from TB_SR_001MT sr001mt join ( select MEM_NO, MEM_NM, mbmt.INST_ID, ismt.INST_NM from TB_MB_001MT mbmt join TB_IS_001MT ismt on mbmt.INST_ID = ismt.INST_ID ) mb001mt on sr001mt.FIRST_INPT_ID = mb001mt.MEM_NO where SR_ID = #{srId}
mapper.update: update TB_SR_001MT set DELT_YN = 'Y', LAST_INPT_DT = sysdate where SR_ID = #{srId}
update TB_SR_001MT set SR_STAT = 'REQT', LAST_INPT_DT = sysdate, REQ_DT = sysdate where SR_ID = #{srId}
update TB_SR_001MT set LAST_INPT_DT = sysdate, DUE_DT = #{dueDt}, SR_TITLE = #{srTitle}, REL_SYS = #{relSys}, SR_CONT = #{srCont} where SR_ID = #{srId}
update TB_SR_001MT set SR_STAT = #{srStat}, REV_CMT = #{revCmt}, LAST_INPT_DT = sysdate where SR_ID = #{srId}
